item.title: interesting lynx
item.description: Interesting stuff I find on the internet and want to promote or revisit. Deep Learning Comprehensive Article The Essence of Linear Algebra Youtube Series Netherlands eScience Software Engineering Guide Open Source Data Science Masters Goodfellow, Bengio, Courville Deep Learning Book Algorithm Design Manual Open Source Data Sets Flask Mega Tutorial FirstCrack Simple Blogging Engine Interpretable Machine Learning Book What Every Computer Science Major Should Know Google SRE Guide Hackernews Good Tools Discussion Spotify's Squad Framework Data Engineering Cookbook Algebra, Topology, Differential Calculus, and Optimization Theory For Computer Science and Machine Learning What Every Programmer Should Know About Memory Introduction to Racket Rust Lang Book A Tour of Go Programming Algorithms with Lisp Design Your Own Computer Learn to Program Intro to Node.

item.title: what are those?
item.description: What things are in three points or less. A continually updating brain dump. gateway A key stopping point for data traveling between networks Can be a computer routing traffic (workplace) or router (at home) Checks IPs of messages and forwards accordingly API Application Program Interface The specification for how a service is to be interacted with URL Uniform Resource Locator, i.e. web address, endpoint A reference to a web resource HTTP HyperText Transfer Protocol Defines how messages are formatted and transmitted on the web Common methods: GET, PUT (idempotent), POST, DELETE, etc.
